The implementation behind the new MMR system has drawn the last bits of enjoyment out of the killer's side of this game entirely. Shockingly naive in its approach, it really only qualifies as a minimum viable product in that it technically does connect people to play - albeit after significantly longer waiting times than most other multiplayers.

The game has gotten consistent updates which favor the survivor's side of the game - most recently a boon system which operates inconsistently with the way totems have worked to this point, and which in effect provides at least three survivors with a fifth perk by simultaneously allowing them a given boon effect and freeing up a space which this effect would previously have taken. Mind you that MMR doesn't seem to account for the perk sets being brought into the game while matchmaking so you can, generously, expect to run against some 60% meta perks in any given game. This design actually creates a situation where many, if not a majority of the killers available in the game become simply not viable as your MMR score increases. If you had hoped to play a few casual or meme games, you can almost assuredly expect to "lose," and be treated some of the most self-unaware bad-mannering the internet has to offer. It all leads to a constant undercurrent of frustration and burnout.

Not everything is lost, however. Though these changes have had marked negative repercussions on the killer side, there's never been a better time to play as a survivor. If you have a group of friends you play with, you may enjoy the game as well as the peripheral community which offers a general atmosphere so toxic it rivals the vitriol of the most ardent Bungie apologists of the Destiny 2 Community.

Writing this based on many hours of playtime. For as long as I can remember this game has always had issues, whether it be a divided community or legitimate bugs where it makes the game unplayable there was always something. This game will always be special to me because I played it on release, but the only focus now a days seems to be pumping out new killers and survivors rather than fix issues that make the game unfair, or unbalanced. Starting out the game as a new player now means hours and hours of playtime you need to put in just to acquire all the perks, and some perks that change the meta of the game are locked behind paywalls. Enter at your own risk.

Dead by Daylight is a multiplayer (4vs1) horror game where one player takes on the role of the savage Killer, and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to escape the Killer and avoid being caught and killed.

RECENT REVIEWS:
Very Positive (11,468)
ALL REVIEWS:
Very Positive (397,254)
RELEASE DATE:
14 Jun, 2016
DEVELOPER:
Behaviour Interactive Inc.
PUBLISHER:
Behaviour Interactive Inc.

fun to play with friends. However, there are few things that need to be improved such as the time for matchmaking, mmr (player's level), face-camping, bugs, and dlc prices. Overall its a fun game to play either solo nor with mates

Sim, o jogo é muito muito bom de se jogar, principalmente com os amigos. Mas depois de um tempo vai ficando muito repetitivo e meio P2W, se eles não fossem tão mercenários, o jogo seria uma maravilha. Por todos esses motivos, te aconselho a comprar apenas em promoção.
u run and people chase you.

It is a great co-op game with lots of options to make it more enjoyable and sometimes challenging. However matching making needs improvement as a new player could be matched with those who've played hundreds of hours. And some people who play this game are toxic, but its a fun game when playing in a group not so fun on your own.
классная игра, хорошо оптимизирована и отличный геймплей за каждого мана.

This game is really buggy and annoying, everyone is extremely toxic, you have to buy characters for real money even though the game already costs a lot of money and there are tons of hackers.
But it's also really fun and surprisingly competitive. The skill ceiling is shockingly high for what seems like such a simple game and almost every match is fun in some way. This game is awesome, just don't play solo q or you will contract aids from the terrible matchmaking.

Отличная игра в своем жанре, сочетает в себе хорошую оптимизацию и интересный геймплей. Частый гость различных распродаж, что позволяет за очень демократичную стоимость приобрести полноценный продукт, который не требует вложений. Игра на крепкую 4 по 5 бальной шкале.

Klasse Spiel, macht viel Spaß. Als Gruselig kann man das Spiel jedoch nicht bezeichnen und wirkt für mich nicht wirklich wie ein Spiel aus der Horror Kategorie. Das Matchmaking im Spiel ist allerdings nicht all zu gut gelungen. Oft Spielt man als Spieler mit wenigen hundert Spielstunden gegen Spieler mit mehreren tausend. Der Unterschied der Spielstunden ist in diesem Spiel oft entscheidender als in vielen anderen Games. Auch bekommen Spieler mit einem schlechteren Ping Spielvorteile, falls man das so nennen kann. Dennoch vom Prinzip und im großen Ganzen der Umsetzung ein tollen Game.
Fixt das Matchmaking aber wenn leute die  5 Spielstunden haben gegen Leute mit 2k+ Spielstunden spielen geht der spielspaß schnell verloren.
